00022 void calcgradGaussianAux(const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00023                          const GaussianAux* X, gradGaussianAux* dX)
00024 {
00025   int i;
00026 
00027   dX->dsig.chi[0][0] = G2->chi[1];      dX->dsig.chi[1][0] = G2->chi[0];
00028   dX->dsig.chi[0][1] = -I*G2->chi[1];   dX->dsig.chi[1][1] = I*G2->chi[0];
00029   dX->dsig.chi[0][2] = G2->chi[0];      dX->dsig.chi[1][2] = -G2->chi[1];
00030 
00031   dX->dlambda = - csqr(X->lambda);
00032   dX->dalpha = X->lambda*(G2->a - X->alpha);
00033 
00034   for (i=0; i<3; i++) 
00035     dX->drho.a[i] = X->lambda*(G2->b[i] - X->rho[i]);
00036   dX->drho.b = G2->a*X->lambda;
00037 
00038   dX->drho2.a = 2*cvec3mult(dX->drho.a, X->rho);
00039   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00040     dX->drho2.b[i] = 2*dX->drho.b*X->rho[i];
00041   
00042   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00043     dX->dpi.a[i] = -X->lambda*X->pi[i];
00044   dX->dpi.b = I*X->lambda;  
00045 
00046   // dX->dpi2.a = 2*cvec3mult(dX->dpi.a, X->pi);
00047   dX->dpi2.a = -2*X->lambda*X->pi2;
00048   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00049     dX->dpi2.b[i] = 2*dX->dpi.b*X->pi[i];
00050   
00051   for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
00052     dX->dS.chi[i] = G2->chi[i];
00053     dX->dQ.chi[i] = X->T* dX->dS.chi[i]* X->R;
00054   }
00055   dX->dR.a = 0.5*(3.0/conj(G1->a) - 3.0*X->lambda - X->pi2)*X->R;
00056   dX->dQ.a = X->T* X->S* dX->dR.a;
00057   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00058     dX->dR.b[i] = I* X->pi[i]* X->R;
00059     dX->dQ.b[i] = X->T* X->S* dX->dR.b[i];
00060   }
00061 }
